text: John M. "Johnny" Orr (June 10, 1927 - December 31, 2013) was an American basketball player and coach. He was best known for as the head coach of men's basketball at the University of Michigan and at Iowa State University. He remains the coach with most wins in Iowa State history, with 218 wins and 200 losses. Orr died from congestive heart failure at the age of 86. ==References== ==Other websites== *player bio at databaseBasketball.com *Where's Coach Now? *Here's Johnny Orr. *LEGEND LOST: Coach Johnny Orr Dies Category:1927 births Category:2013 deaths Category:American basketball players Category:American military personnel of World War II Category:College basketball coaches Category:Deaths from congestive heart failure Category:Small forwards Category:Sportspeople from Illinois Category:Sportspeople from Iowa Category:Sportspeople from Kansas Category:Sportspeople from Michigan
title: Johnny Orr
